headline: Carnival Corporation & plc Announces Pricing of $2.0 Billion 6.125% Senior Unsecured Notes Offering for Refinancing and Interest Expense Reduction
summary: Carnival Corporation & plc (NYSE/LSE: CCL; NYSE: CUK) today announced that Carnival Corporation (the "Company") priced its private offering (the "Notes Offering") of $2.0 billion aggregate principal amount of 6.125% senior unsecured notes due 2033 (the "Notes"). The Company expects to use the net proceeds from the Notes Offering, together with cash on hand, to redeem the $2.03 billion 10.375% senior priority notes due 2028 (the "Senior Priority Notes") of Carnival Holdings (Bermuda) Limited ("Ca

headline: Royal Caribbean, Stock Of The Day, Surges On Earnings, Outlook, New River Cruises
summary: Royal Caribbean cleared Q4 earnings estimates and provided a strong, demand-fueled outlook. Royal announced new river cruises.

headline: Cunard invites the public to co-create a "Sea of Glamour" exhibition celebrating 185 years of ocean travel
summary: Are future generations at risk of losing precious childhood memories? According to new research by luxury British cruise line Cunard, the digital age is creating a generational gap in our collective history. In response to this, Cunard is calling upon the public to help preserve these precious moments in a new physical exhibition curated by renowned British photographer Mary McCartney to mark 185 years of ocean travel.

headline: Carnival Corporation & plc Announces the Redemption of Existing $2.03 Billion Senior Priority Notes and Launch of New Senior Unsecured Notes Offering for Interest Expense Reduction
